title: Justin Herbert on the Chargers Offense and the 2022 Season. Plus, an NFL News Roundup.
description:
L.A. Chargers QB Justin Herbert joins the show to talk Brandon Staley, his offseason workouts, deep throws, and the new Chargers defense. Then Kevin, Ben, and Steven discuss the latest offseason news, including updates on Colin Kaepernick and Tua Tagovailoa.

Host: Kevin Clark, Steven Ruiz, and Ben Solak
Guest: Justin Herbert
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
